about_the_game:
For centuries, an ancient family has ruled the lands of the morbid and decadent province of Rubro Rose, but with the sudden illness of the lord of Vorkrom Castle, everything falls upon the young princess of pale skin...

The Rubro Rose's Castle is an interactive fiction with dynamic narration where your choices and interactions will determine the course of the story and the paths to follow. A dark fantasy tale told in a Gothic-Atmospheric RPG, stylized and fully voiced, with character dialogues and narrations in English and Brazilian Portuguese for its main scenes.

The mechanics of this morbid and dark adventure blend classic Visual Novels with modern elements of exploration and mystery, bringing peculiar gameplay that seeks to immerse you in the devastated lands surrounding Vorkrom Castle, as Sir Odlinav, a renowned gentleman from the Southern Lands, and Ruby, the lady of Rubro Rose.

"For centuries, an honorable royal family has governed the lands of this small yet decadent province. Every soul within the populace languishes in poverty, wretchedness, and unhealthiness; they slay and disfigure each other to survive while the streets run red with entrails and blood…

In a morbid and decrepit world where the mighty trample and crush the weak to survive, not even the departed find respite.

Peace Is Not An Option In these Tainted lands.

Not Even Eternal Peace…”

content_descriptors.notes: The Rubro Rose's Castle addresses sensitive themes that may not be comfortable for some people. It contains violence, cruelty, gore, nudity, sexual content, psychological horror and description of extreme acts.
